name: ProgDVB Skin
summary: An XSOSD file is a skin created for use with ProgDVB, a program used to watch digital TV and listen to radio channels. It contains XML-formatted text that defines a skin's settings and metadata . XSOSD files are created using ProgDVB's SkinEditor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: XSOSD file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.alt: XSOSD file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
